Verses: 1 aanapadiyaal, Kiristhu Yesuvukkutpattavargalaayirundhu, Maamsaththinpadi Nadavaamal Aaviyinpadiye Nadakkiravargalukku Aakkinaiththeerppillai.
2 kiristhu Yesuvinaale Jeevanudaiya Aaviyin Piramaanam Ennaip Paavam Maranam Enbavaigalin Piramaanaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkitre.

3 adheppadiyenil, Maamsaththinaale Balaveenamaayirundha Niyaayappiramaanam Seyyakkoodaadhadhai Dhevane Seyyumpadikku, Thammudaiya Kumaaranaip Paavamaamsaththin Saayalaagavum, Paavaththaip Pokkum Baliyaagavum Anuppi, Maamsaththile Paavaththai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerththaar.
4 maamsaththinpadi Nadavaamal Aaviyinpadi Nadakkira Nammidaththil Niyaayappiramaanaththin Needhi Niraiverumpadikke Appadich Seydhaar.
5 andriyum Maamsaththinpadi Nadakkiravargal Maamsaththukkuriyavaigalai Sindhikkiraargal; Aaviyinpadi Nadakkiravargal Aavikkuriyavaikalai Sindhikkiraargal.
6 maamsasindhai Maranam; Aaviyin Sindhaiyo Jeevanum Samaadhaanamumaam.
7 eppadiyendraal, Maamsasindhai Dhevanukku Virodhamaana Pagai; Adhu Dhevanudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththukkuk Keezhppadiyaamalum, Keezhppadiyakkoodaamalum Irukkiradhu.
8 maamsaththukkutpattavargal Dhevanukkup Piriyamaayirukkamaattaargal.
9 dhevanudaiya Aavi Ungalil Vaasamaayirundhaal, Neengal Maamsaththukkutpattavargalaayiraamal Aavikkutpattavargalaayiruppeergal. Kiristhuvin Aaviyillaadhavan Avarudaiyavanalla.
10 melum Kiristhu Ungalilirundhaal, Sareeramaanadhu Paavaththinimiththam Mariththadhaayum, Aaviyaanadhu Needhiyinimiththam Jeevanulladhaayum Irukkum.

11 andriyum Yesuvai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinavarudaiya Aavi Ungalil Vaasamaayirundhaal, Kiristhuvai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinavar Ungalil Vaasamaayirukkira Thammudaiya Aaviyinaale Saavukkedhuvaana Ungal Sareerangalaiyum Uyirppippaar.
12 aagaiyaal Sagodharare, Maamsaththinpadi Pizhaippadharku Naam Maamsaththukkuk Kadanaaligalalla.
13 maamsaththinpadi Pizhaiththaal Saaveergal; Aaviyinaale Sareeraththin Seygaigalai Azhiththaal Pizhaippeergal.
14 melum Evargal Dhevanudaiya Aaviyinaale Nadaththappadugiraargalo, Avargal Dhevanudaiya Buththiraraayirukkiraargal.
15 andhappadi, Thirumbavumpayappadugiradharku Neengal Adimaiththanaththin Aaviyaip Peraamal, Appaa Pidhaave, Endru Kooppidappannugira Buththira Suvigaaraththin Aaviyaip Petreergal.
16 naam Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalaayirukkiromendru Aaviyaanavardhaame Nammudaiya Aaviyudanekooda Saatchikodukkiraar.

17 naam Pillaigalaanaal Sudhandhararumaame; Dhevanudaiya Sudhandhararum, Kiristhuvukku Udan Sudhandhararumaame; Kiristhuvudanekooda Naam Magimaippadumpadikku Avarudanekoodap Paadupattaal Appadiyaagum.
18 aadhalaal Ikkaalaththup Paadugal Ini Nammidaththil Velippadum Magimaikku Oppidaththakkavaigal Allavendru Ennugiren.
19 melum Dhevanudaiya Buththirar Velippaduvadharku Sirushtiyaanadhu Migundha Aavalode Kaaththukkondirukkiradhu.
20 adhenendraal Sirushtiyaanadhu Azhivukkuriya Adimaiththanaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkappattu, Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalukkuriya Magimaiyaana Suyaadheenaththaip Petrukkollum Engira Nambikkaiyode,
21 andha Sirushtiyaanadhu Suya Ishtaththinaale Alla, Keezhppaduththinavaraaleye Maayaikkuk Keezhppattirukkiradhu.
22 aagaiyaal Namakkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Idhuvaraikkum Sarva Sirushtiyum Egamaaith Thaviththup Pirasavavedhanaippadugiradhu.
23 adhuvumallaamal, Aaviyin Mudharbalangalaip Petra Naamunkooda Nammudaiya Sareerameetpaagiya Buththirasuvigaaram Varugiradharkuk Kaaththirundhu, Namakkulle Thavikkirom.
24 andha Nambikkaiyinaale Naam Ratchikkappattirukkirom. Kaanappadugiradhai Nambugiradhu Nambikkaiyalla; Oruvan Thaan Kaangiradhai Nambavenduvadhenna?
25 naam Kaanaadhadhai Nambinomaagil, Adhu Varugiradharkup Porumaiyode Kaaththiruppom.

26 andhappadiye Aaviyaanavarum Namadhu Balaveenangalil Namakku Udhaviseygiraar. Naam Etrapadi Vendikkollavendiyadhinnadhendru Ariyaamalirukkirapadiyaal, Aaviyaanavardhaame Vaakkukkadangaadha Perumoochchugalodu Namakkaaga Vendudhalseygiraar.
27 aaviyaanavar Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Parisuththavaangalukkaaga Vendudhal Seygirapadiyaal, Irudhayangalai Aaraaindhupaarkkiravar Aaviyin Sindhai Innadhendru Arivaar.
28 andriyum, Avarudaiya Theermaanaththinpadi Azhaikkappattavargalaai Dhevanidaththil Anbukoorugiravargalukku Sagalamum Nanmaikku Edhuvaaga Nadakkiradhendru Arindhirukkirom.

29 thammudaiya Kumaaran Anega Sagodhararukkulle Mudharperaanavaraayirukkumporuttu, Dhevan Evargalai Munnarindhaaro Avargalaith Thamadhu Kumaaranudaiya Saayalukku Oppaayiruppadharku Munkuriththirukkiraar;

30 evargalai Munkuriththaaro Avargalai Azhaiththumirukkiraar; Evargalai Azhaiththaaro Avargalai Needhimaangalaakkiyumirukkiraar; Evargalai Needhimaangalaakkinaaro Avargalai Magimaippaduththiyumirukkiraar.
31 ivaigalaikkuriththu Naam Ennasolluvom? Dhevan Nammudaiya Patchaththilirundhaal Namakku Virodhamaayiruppavan Yaar?
32 thammudaiya Sondhakkumaaranendrum Paaraamal Nammellaarukkaagavum Avarai Oppukkoduththavar, Avarodekooda Matra Ellaavatraiyum Namakku Arulaadhiruppadheppadi?
33 dhevan Therindhukondavargalmel Kutranjaattugiravan Yaar? Dhevane Avargalai Needhimaangalaakkugiravar.
34 aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkiravan Yaar? Kiristhuve Mariththavar; Avare Ezhundhumirukkiravar; Avare Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththilum Irukkiravar, Namakkaaga Vendudhal Seygiravarum Avare.
35 umadhunimiththam Enneramum Kollappadugirom, Adikkappadum Aadugalaippola Ennappadugirom Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi Nerittaalum,
36 kiristhuvin Anbaivittu Nammaip Pirippavan Yaar? Ubaththiravamo, Viyaagulamo, Thunbamo, Pasiyo, Nirvaanamo, Naasamo, Pattayamo?
37 ivaiyellaavatrileyum Naam Nammil Anbukoorugiravaraale Mutrum Jeyankollugiravargalaayirukkirome.
38 maranamaanaalum, Jeevanaanaalum, Dhevathoodhargalaanaalum, Adhigaarangalaanaalum, Vallamaigalaanaalum, Nigazhkaariyangalaanaalum, Varungaariyangalaanaalum,
39 uyarvaanaalum, Thaazhvaanaalum, Verendha Sirushtiyaanaalum Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvilulla Dhevanudaiya Anbaivittu Nammaip Pirikkamaattaadhendru Nichchayiththirukkiren.
